translations.text: Haa-Meeem

translations.text: Basheeranw Wa-nazeeran fa-a'rada aksaruhum fahum laa yasma'oon

words.id: dan mereka berkata||hati kami||dalam||tutupan||dari apa||kamu menyeru kami||kepadanya||dan dalam||telinga kami||sumbat||dan dari||antara kami||dan antara kamu||dinding||maka bekerjalah||sesungguhnya kami||orang-orang yang bekerja

translations.text: Wa-qaaloo quloobunaa feee akinnatim mimmaa tad'oonaaa ilaihi Wa-feee aazaaninaa waqrunw Wa-mim baininaa Wa-bainika hijaabun fa'mal innanaa aamiloon

translations.text: Qul innamaaa ana basharum mislukum yoohaaa ilaiya annamaaa ilaahukum ilaahunw Waahidun fastaqeemooo ilaihi wastaghfirooh; Wa-wailul lil-mushrikeen

translations.text: Allazeena laa yu'toonaz Zakaata Wa-hum bil-Aakhirati hum kaafiroon

words.id: sesungguhnya||orang-orang yang||beriman||dan berbuat||baik||bagi mereka||pahala||tidak||terputus-putus

translations.text: innal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati lahum ajrun ghairu mamnoon

translations.text: Qul a'innakum latakfuroona billazee khalaqal arda fee yawmaini Wa-taj'aloona lahooo andaadaa; zaalika Rabbul 'aalameen

translations.text: Wa-ja'ala feehaa rawaa-siya min fawqihaa Wa-baaraka feehaa Wa-qaddara feehaaaa aqwaatahaa feee arba'ati ayyaamin sawaaa'al lissaaa'ileen

translations.text: Summas tawaaa ilas samaaa'i Wa-hiya dukhaanun faqaala lahaa Wa-lil-ardi' tiyaaa taw'an aw karhan qaalataaa atainaa taaa'i'een

translations.text: Faqadaahunna sab'a samaawaatin fee yawmaini Wa-awhaa fee kulli samaaa'in amarahaa; Wa-zaiyannassa maaa'ad dunyaa bimasaabeeha Wa-hifzaa; zaalika taqdeerul Azeezil 'Aleem

translations.text: Fa-in a'radoo faqul anzartukum saa'iqatam misla saa'iqati Aadinw Wa-Samood

translations.text: Fa-ammaa 'Aadun fastak-baroo fil ardi bighairul haqqi Wa-qaaloo man ashaddu minnaa quwwatan awalam yaraw annal laahal lazee khalaqahum Huwa ashaddu minhum quwwatanw Wa-kaanoo bi-Aayaatinaa yajhadoon

translations.text: Fa-arsalnaa alaihim reehan sarsaran feee ayyaamin nahisaatil linuzeeqahum 'azaabal khizyi fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-la'azaabul Aakhirati akhzaa Wa-hum laa yunsaroon

translations.text: Wa-ammaa Samoodu fahadinaahum fastahabbul 'ama 'alal huda fa-akhazathum saa'iqatul azaabil hooni bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon

words.id: dan Kami selamatkan||orang-orang yang||beriman||dan adalah mereka||mereka bertakwa
words.en: And We saved||those who||believed||and used (to)||fear (Allah)

translations.text: Wa-najjainal lazeena aamanoo Wa-kaanoo yattaqoon

words.en: And (the) Day||will be gathered||(the) enemies||(of) Allah||to||the Fire||then they||will be assembled in rows

translations.text: Wa-yawma yuhsharu a'daaa'ul laahi ilan Naari fahum yooza'oon

words.id: sehingga||apabila||apa-apa||mereka datang kepadanya||menjadi saksi||atas mereka||pendengaran mereka||dan penglihatan mereka||dan kulit-kulit mereka||tentang apa||adalah mereka||mereka kerjakan

translations.text: Hattaaa izaa maa jaaa'oohaa shahida alaihim samu'uhum Wa-absaaruhum Wa-julooduhum bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon

words.id: dan mereka berkata||kepada kulit-kulit mereka||mengapa||kamu menjadi saksi||atas kami||(kulit-kulit) berkata||menjadikan kami berkata||Allah||yang||menjadikan berkata||segala||sesuatu||dan Dia||menciptakan kalian||pertama||kali||dan kepada-Nya||kalian dikembalikan

translations.text: Wa-qaaloo lijuloodihim lima shahittum alainaa qaaloo antaqanal laahul lazeee antaqa kulla shai'inw Wa-Huwa khalaqakum awwala marratinw Wa-ilaihi turja'oon

words.en: And not||you were||covering yourselves||lest||testify||against you||your hearing||and not||your sight||and not||your skins||but||you assumed||that||Allah||(does) not||know||much||of what||you do

translations.text: Wa-maa kuntum tastatiroona aien yashhada alaikum sam'ukum Wa-laaa absaarukum Wa-laa juloodukum Wa-laakin zanantum annal laaha laa ya'lamu kaseeram mimmaa ta'maloon

translations.text: Wa-zaalikum zannukumul lazee zanantum bi-Rabbikum ardaakum fa-asbahtum minal khaasireen

translations.text: Fa-ien yasbiroo fan-naaru maswal lahum Wa-ien yasta'tiboo famaa hum minal mu'tabeen

translations.text: Wa-qaiyadnaa lahum quranaaa'a fazaiyyanoo lahum maa baina aideehim Wa-maa khalfahum Wa-haqqa alaihimul qawlu feee umamin qad khalat min qablihim minal jinni wal-insi innahum kaanoo khaasireen

translations.text: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafaroo laa tasma'oo lihaazal Quraani walghaw feehi la'allakum taghliboon

translations.text: Falanuzeeqannal lazeena kafaroo 'azaaban shadeedanw Wa-lanajziyannahum aswal lazee kaanoo ya'maloon

translations.text: Zaalika jazaaa'u a'daaa'il laahin Naaru lahum feehaa daarul khuld, jazaaa'am bimaa kaanoo bi-aayaatinaa yajhadoon

translations.text: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafaroo Rabbanaaa arinal lazaini adal-laanaa minal jinni wal-insi naj'alhumaa tahta aqdaaminaa liyakoonaa minal asfaleen

translations.text: innal lazeena qaaloo Rabbunal laahu summas taqaamoo tatanazzalu alaihimul malaaa-'ikatu allaa takhaafoo Wa-laa tahzanoo Wa-abshiroo bil-Jannnatil latee kuntum too'adoon

translations.text: Nahnu awliyaaa'ukum fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-fil Aakhirati Wa-lakum feehaa maa tashtaheee anfusukum Wa-lakum feehaa ma tadda'oon

words.id: pemberian||dari||Maha Pengampun||Maha Penyayang

translations.text: Nuzulam min Ghafoorir Raheem

words.id: dan siapa||lebih baik||perkataan||daripada orang||dia menyeru||kepada||Allah||dan berbuat||kebaikan||dan dia berkata||sesungguhnya aku||termasuk||orang-orang yang berserah diri

translations.text: Wa-man ahsanu qawlam mimman da'aaa ilal laahi Wa-'amila saalihanw Wa-qaala innanee minal muslimeen

translations.text: Wa-laa tastawil hasanatu Wa-las saiyi'ah; idfa' billatee hiya ahsanu fa'izal lazee bainaka Wa-bainahoo 'adaawatun ka'annahoo waliyun hameem

words.en: And not||it is granted||except||(to) those who||(are) patient||and not||it is granted||except||(to the) owner||(of) fortune||great

translations.text: Wa-maa yulaqqaahaaa illal lazeena sabaroo Wa-maa yulaqqaahaaa illaa zoo hazzin 'azeem

words.id: dan jika||mengganggu kamu||dari||syaitan||gangguan||maka berlindunglah||kepada Allah||sesungguhnya Dia||Dia||Maha mendengar||Maha Mengetahui
words.en: And if||whisper comes to you||from||the Shaitan||an evil suggestion||then seek refuge||in Allah||Indeed He||[He]||(is) the All-Hearer||the All-Knower

translations.text: Wa-immaa yanzaghannaka minash Shaitaani nazghun fasta'iz billaahi innahoo Huwas Samee'ul 'Aleem

words.id: dan dari||tanda-tanda-Nya||malam||dan siang||dan matahari||dan bulan||tidak||kamu bersujud||kepada matahari||dan jangan||pada bulan||dan bersujudlah||kepada Allah||yang||menciptakan semuanya||jika||kalian adalah||hanya kepada-Nya||kamu menyembah

translations.text: Wa-min Aayaatihil lailu wannahaaru washshamsu walqamar; laa tasjudoo lishshamsi Wa-laa lilqamari wasjudoo lillaahil lazee khala-qahunna in kuntum iyyaahu ta'budoon

words.en: But if||they are arrogant||then those who||(are) near||your Lord||glorify||Him||by night||and day||And they||(do) not||tire

translations.text: Fa-inis takbaroo fallazee-na inda Rabbika yusabbihoona lahoo billaili wannnahaari Wa-hum laa yas'amoon

words.id: dan dari||tanda-tanda-Nya||bahwasanya kamu||melihat||bumi||tandus||maka apabila||Kami turunkan||atasnya||air||ia bergerak||dan berkembang||sesungguhnya||yang||menghidupkannya||tentu dapat menghidupkan||yang mati||sesungguhnya Dia||atas||segala||sesuatu||Maha Kuasa

translations.text: Wa-min Aayaatiheee annaka taral arda khaashi'atan fa-izaaa anzalna alaihal maaa'ah tazzat Wa-rabat; innal lazeee ahyaahaa lamuhiyil mawtaa; innahoo 'alaa kulli shai-in Qadeer

translations.text: innal lazeena yulhidoona feee Aayaatina laa yakhfawna alainaa' afamai yulqaa fin Naari khayrun am maien yaateee aaminai Yawmal Qiyaamah; i'maloo ma shi'tum innahoo bimaa ta'maloona Baseer

translations.text: innal Lazeena kafaroo biz-Zikri lammaa jaa'ahum Wa-innahoo la-Kitaabun 'Azeez

words.id: tidak||datang kepadanya||kebathilan||dari||antara||depannya||dan tidak||dari||belakangnya||diturunkan||dari||Yang Maha Bijaksana||Maha Terpuji
words.en: Not||comes to it||the falsehood||from||before it||before it||and not||from||behind it||A Revelation||from||(the) All-Wise||(the) Praiseworthy

translations.text: Laa yaateehil baatilu mim baini yadaihi Wa-laa min khalfihee tanzeelum min Hakeemin Hameed

words.id: tidak||dikatakan||kepadamu||kecuali||apa||sesungguhnya||dikatakan||kepada rasul-rasul||dari||sebelum kamu||sesungguhnya||Tuhanmu||benar-benar mempunyai||ampunan||dan mempunyai||siksaan/hukuman||pedih
words.en: Not||is said||to you||except||what||was said||was said||to the Messengers||before you||before you||Indeed||your Lord||(is) Possessor||(of) forgiveness||and Possessor||(of) penalty||painful

translations.text: Maa yuqaalu laka illaa maa qad qeela lir-Rusuli min qablik; inna Rabbaka lazoo maghfiratinw Wa-zoo iqaabin aleem

words.id: dan jika||Kami jadikannya||bacaan||bahasa asing/selain bahasa Arab||tentu mereka mengatakan||mengapa tidak||dijelaskan||ayat-ayatnya||apakah bahasa asing/selain bahasa Arab||dan orang Arab/bahasa Arab||katakanlah||ia/Al Qur'an||bagi orang-orang yang||beriman||petunjuk||dan penawar/obat||dan orang-orang yang||tidak||mereka beriman||pada||telinga mereka||sumbat||dan ia/Al Qur'an||atas mereka||buta/kegelapan||mereka itu||mereka dipanggil||dari||tempat||yang jauh
words.en: And if||We (had) made it||a Quran||(in) a foreign (language)||they (would have) said||Why not||are explained in detail||its verses||(Is it) a foreign (language)||and an Arab||Say||It (is)||for those who||believe||a guidance||and a healing||And those who||(do) not||believe||in||their ears||(is) deafness||and it||(is) for them||blindness||Those||are being called||from||a place||far

translations.text: Wa-law ja'alnaahu Qur-aanan A'jamiyyal laqaaloo law-laa fussilat Aayaatuhoo a-A'jamiyyunw Wa-'Arabiyy; qul huwa lillazeena aamanoo hudanw Wa-shifaaa'unw wallazeena la yu'minoona feee aazaanihim waqrunw Wa-huwa alaihim 'amaa; ulaaa'ika yunaadawna mim maakaanim ba'eed

words.id: dan sesungguhnya||telah Kami berikan||Musa||kitab||maka ia diperselisihkan||didalamnya||dan jika tidak||kalimat/ketetapan||telah lewat/terdahulu||dari||Tuhanmu||tentu diputuskan||diantara mereka||dan sesungguhnya mereka||benar-benar dalam||keraguan||dari padanya||kebingungan
words.en: And certainly||We gave||Musa||the Book||but disputes arose||therein||And had it not been||(for) a word||that preceded||from||your Lord||surely would have been settled||between them||But indeed they||surely (are) in||doubt||about it||disquieting

translations.text: Wa-laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba fakhtulifa fee; Wa-lawlaa Kalimatun sabaqat mir Rabbika laqudiya bainahum; Wa-innahum lafee shakkim minhu mureeb

words.id: barang siapa||berbuat||kebaikan||maka untuk dirinya sendiri||dan barang siapa||berbuat jahat||maka atasnya||dan tidaklah||Tuhanmu||berbuat aniaya||terhadap hamba-hambanya
words.en: Whoever||does||righteous deeds||then it is for his soul||and whoever||does evil||then it is against it||And not||(is) your Lord||unjust||to His slaves

translations.text: Man amila salihan falinafsihee Wa-man asaaa'a fa'alaihaa; wamaa rabbuka bizallaamil lil-'abeed

words.id: kepada-Nya||dikembalikan||pengetahuan||hari kiamat||dan tidak||keluar||dari||buah-buahan||dari||kelopaknya||dan tidak||mengandung||dari seorang||perempuan||dan tidak||melahirkan||kecuali||dengan pengetahuan-Nya||dan pada hari||Dia memanggil mereka||dimana||sekutu-sekutu-Ku||mereka menjawab||kami nyatakan kepada Engaku||tidak ada||diantara kami||dari||seorang saksi
words.en: To Him||is referred||(the) knowledge||(of) the Hour||And not||comes out||any||fruits||from||their coverings||and not||bears||any||female||and not||gives birth||except||with His knowledge||And (the) Day||He will call them||Where (are)||My partners||They will say||We announce (to) You||not||among us||any||witness

translations.text: ilaihi yuraddu ilmus Saaa'ah; Wa-maa takhruju min samaraatim min akmaamihaa Wa-maa tahmilu min unsaa Wa-laa tada'u illaa bi'ilmih; Wa-Yawma yunaadeehim aina shurakaaa'ee qaalooo aazannaaka maa minnaa min shaheed

words.id: dan sesat/lenyap||dari mereka||apa yang||mereka adalah||mereka sembah||dari||sebelum||dan mereka menyangka||tidak ada||bagi mereka||dari||tempat lari
words.en: And lost||from them||what||they were||invoking||before||before||and they (will) be certain||(that) not||for them||any||place of escape

translations.text: Wa-dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yad'oona min qablu Wa-zannoo maa lahum mim mahees

words.id: tidak||jemu-jemu||manusia||dari||memohon||kebaikan||dan jika||menimpa dia||kejelekan||maka dia jemu||putus asa
words.en: (Does) not||get tired||man||of||praying||(for) the good||but if||touches him||the evil||then he gives up hope||(and) despairs

translations.text: Laa yas'amul insaanu min du'aaa'il khairi Wa-im massa hush-sharru fa-ya'oosun qanoot

words.id: dan jika||Kami rasakan kepadanya||rahmat||dari Kami||dari||sesudah||kesusahan||menimpanya||tentu dia berkata||ini||bagiku||dan tidak||aku mengira||hari kiamat||terjadi||dan jika||aku dikembalikan||kepada||Tuhanku||sesungguhnya||bagiku||di sisi-Nya||kebaikan||maka sungguh akan Kami beritakan||orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||dengan apa||mereka kerjakan||dan sungguh akan Kami rasakan kepada mereka||dari||azab||keras
words.en: And verily, if||We let him taste||mercy||from Us||after||after||an adversity||(has) touched him||he will surely say||This (is)||(due) to me||and not||I think||the Hour||(will be) established||and if||I am returned||to||my Lord||indeed||for me||with Him||(will be) the best||But We will surely inform||those who||disbelieved||about what||they did||and We will surely make them taste||of||a punishment||severe

translations.text: Wa-la-in azaqnaahu rahmatam minnaa mim ba'di dar-raaa'a massat-hu la-yaqoolanna haazaa lee Wa-maaa azunnus Saa'ata qaaa'imatanw Wa-la'in ruji'tu ilaa Rabbeee inna lee indahoo lalhusnaa; falanu-nabbi'annal lazeena kafaroo bimaa amiloo Wa-lanuzeeqan-nahum min azaabin ghaleez

words.id: dan apabila||Kami berikan nikmat||atas||manusia||ia berpaling||dan menjauhkan diri||disampingnya||dan apabila||menimpanya||kejelekan||maka ia mempunyai||permohonan||luas/panjang
words.en: And when||We bestow favor||upon||man||he turns away||and distances himself||and distances himself||but when||touches him||the evil||then (he is) full||(of) supplication||lengthy

translations.text: Wa-izaaa an'amnaa 'alal insaani a'rada Wa-na-aa bijaani-bihee Wa-izaa massahush sharru fazoo du'aaa'in 'areed

words.id: katakanlah||bagaimana pendapatmu||jika||ia adalah||dari||sisi||Allah||kemudian||kamu ingkar||padanya||siapakah||lebih sesat||dari pada orang||dia||dalam||perselisihan||jauh
words.en: Say||You see||if||it is||from||from||Allah||then||you disbelieve||in it||who||(is) more astray||than (one) who||he||(is) in||opposition||far

translations.text: Qul araaitum in kaana min indil laahi summa kafar-tum bihee man adallu mimman huwa fee shiqaqim ba'eed

words.id: akan Kami perlihatkan kepada mereka||tanda-tanda Kami||pada||segenap penjuru||dan pada||diri mereka||sehingga||jelas||bagi mereka||bahwasanya ia||hak/benar||ataukah tidak||cukup||dengan Tuhanmu||bahwasanya Dia||atas||segala||sesuatu||menjadi saksi
words.en: Soon We will show them||Our Signs||in||the horizons||and in||themselves||until||becomes clear||to them||that it||(is) the truth||Is (it) not||sufficient||concerning your Lord||that He||(is) over||all||things||a Witness

translations.text: Sanureehim Aayaatinaa fil aafaaqi Wa-feee anfusihim hattaa yatabaiyana lahum annahul haqq; awa-lam yakfi bi-Rabbika annahoo 'alaa kulli shai-in Shaheed

words.id: ingatlah||sesungguhnya mereka||dalam||keraguan||dari||pertemuan||Tuhan mereka||ingatlah||sesungguhnya Dia||dengan segala||sesuatu||Maha Meliputi
words.en: Unquestionably||they||(are) in||doubt||about||(the) meeting||(with) their Lord||Unquestionably||indeed He||(is) of all||things||encompassing

translations.text: Alaaa innahum fee miryatim mil liqaaa'i Rabbihim; alaaa innahoo bikulli shai'im muheet
